name: BullCow
description:
This is a classic text game where yo have to guess the hidden word before you run out of lives. With each guess you'll know if you have cows or bulls. A bull is a correct letter in a correct position, and a cow is a correct letter in an incorrect position. Also this game has only isograms (words wihtout repeating letters). 

When the game starts you may need to click and then press tab to be able to start typing. Press 'q' to quit.
